00010 #include <math.h>
00011 #include <qpainter.h>
00012 #include "qwt_math.h"
00013 #include "qwt_painter.h"
00014 #include "qwt_compass_rose.h"
00015 
00016 static QPoint cutPoint(QPoint p11, QPoint p12, QPoint p21, QPoint p22)
00017 {
00018     double dx1 = p12.x() - p11.x();
00019     double dy1 = p12.y() - p11.y();
00020     double dx2 = p22.x() - p21.x();
00021     double dy2 = p22.y() - p21.y();
00022 
00023     if ( dx1 == 0.0 && dx2 == 0.0 )
00024         return QPoint();
00025 
00026     if ( dx1 == 0.0 )
00027     {
00028         const double m = dy2 / dx2;
00029         const double t = p21.y() - m * p21.x();
00030         return QPoint(p11.x(), qRound(m * p11.x() + t));
00031     }
00032 
00033     if ( dx2 == 0 )
00034     {
00035         const double m = dy1 / dx1;
00036         const double t = p11.y() - m * p11.x();
00037         return QPoint(p21.x(), qRound(m * p21.x() + t));
00038     }
00039 
00040     const double m1 = dy1 / dx1;
00041     const double t1 = p11.y() - m1 * p11.x();
00042 
00043     const double m2 = dy2 / dx2;
00044     const double t2 = p21.y() - m2 * p21.x();
00045 
00046     if ( m1 == m2 )
00047         return QPoint();
00048 
00049     const double x = ( t2 - t1 ) / ( m1 - m2 );
00050     const double y = t1 + m1 * x;
00051 
00052     return QPoint(qRound(x), qRound(y));
00053 }
00054 
00055 QwtSimpleCompassRose::QwtSimpleCompassRose(int numThorns, int numThornLevels):
00056     d_width(0.2),
00057     d_numThorns(numThorns),
00058     d_numThornLevels(numThornLevels),
00059     d_shrinkFactor(0.9)
00060 {
00061     const QColor dark(128,128,255);
00062     const QColor light(192,255,255);
00063     
00064     QPalette palette;
00065     for ( int i = 0; i < QPalette::NColorGroups; i++ )
00066     {
00067 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00068         palette.setColor((QPalette::ColorGroup)i,
00069             QColorGroup::Dark, dark);
00070         palette.setColor((QPalette::ColorGroup)i,
00071             QColorGroup::Light, light);
00072 #else
00073         palette.setColor((QPalette::ColorGroup)i,
00074             QPalette::Dark, dark);
00075         palette.setColor((QPalette::ColorGroup)i,
00076             QPalette::Light, light);
00077 #endif
00078     }
00079 
00080     setPalette(palette);
00081 }
00082 
00092 void QwtSimpleCompassRose::draw(QPainter *painter, const QPoint &center, 
00093     int radius, double north, QPalette::ColorGroup cg) const
00094 {
00095 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00096     QColorGroup colorGroup;
00097     switch(cg)
00098     {
00099         case QPalette::Disabled:
00100             colorGroup = palette().disabled();
00101         case QPalette::Inactive:
00102             colorGroup = palette().inactive();
00103         default:
00104             colorGroup = palette().active();
00105     }
00106 
00107     drawRose(painter, colorGroup, center, radius, north, d_width, 
00108         d_numThorns, d_numThornLevels, d_shrinkFactor);
00109 #else
00110     QPalette pal = palette();
00111     pal.setCurrentColorGroup(cg);
00112     drawRose(painter, pal, center, radius, north, d_width, 
00113         d_numThorns, d_numThornLevels, d_shrinkFactor);
00114 #endif
00115 }
00116 
00117 void QwtSimpleCompassRose::drawRose(
00118     QPainter *painter, 
00119 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00120     const QColorGroup &cg,
00121 #else
00122     const QPalette &palette,
00123 #endif
00124     const QPoint &center, int radius, double north, double width,
00125     int numThorns, int numThornLevels, double shrinkFactor)
00126 {
00127     if ( numThorns < 4 )
00128         numThorns = 4;
00129 
00130     if ( numThorns % 4 )
00131         numThorns += 4 - numThorns % 4;
00132 
00133     if ( numThornLevels <= 0 )
00134         numThornLevels = numThorns / 4;
00135 
00136     if ( shrinkFactor >= 1.0 )
00137         shrinkFactor = 1.0;
00138 
00139     if ( shrinkFactor <= 0.5 )
00140         shrinkFactor = 0.5;
00141 
00142     painter->save();
00143 
00144     painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00145 
00146     for ( int j = 1; j <= numThornLevels; j++ )
00147     {
00148         double step =  pow(2.0, j) * M_PI / (double)numThorns;
00149         if ( step > M_PI_2 )
00150             break;
00151 
00152         double r = radius;
00153         for ( int k = 0; k < 3; k++ )
00154         {
00155             if ( j + k < numThornLevels )
00156                 r *= shrinkFactor;
00157         }
00158 
00159         double leafWidth = r * width;
00160         if ( 2.0 * M_PI / step > 32 )
00161             leafWidth = 16;
00162 
00163         const double origin = north / 180.0 * M_PI;
00164         for ( double angle = origin; 
00165             angle < 2.0 * M_PI + origin; angle += step)
00166         {
00167             const QPoint p = qwtPolar2Pos(center, r, angle);
00168             QPoint p1 = qwtPolar2Pos(center, leafWidth, angle + M_PI_2);
00169             QPoint p2 = qwtPolar2Pos(center, leafWidth, angle - M_PI_2);
00170 
00171             QwtPolygon pa(3);
00172             pa.setPoint(0, center);
00173             pa.setPoint(1, p);
00174 
00175             QPoint p3 = qwtPolar2Pos(center, r, angle + step / 2.0);
00176             p1 = cutPoint(center, p3, p1, p);
00177             pa.setPoint(2, p1);
00178 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00179             painter->setBrush(cg.brush(QColorGroup::Dark));
00180 #else
00181             painter->setBrush(palette.brush(QPalette::Dark));
00182 #endif
00183             painter->drawPolygon(pa);
00184 
00185             QPoint p4 = qwtPolar2Pos(center, r, angle - step / 2.0);
00186             p2 = cutPoint(center, p4, p2, p);
00187 
00188             pa.setPoint(2, p2);
00189 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00190             painter->setBrush(cg.brush(QColorGroup::Light));
00191 #else
00192             painter->setBrush(palette.brush(QPalette::Light));
00193 #endif
00194             painter->drawPolygon(pa);
00195         }
00196     }
00197     painter->restore();
00198 }

00205 void QwtSimpleCompassRose::setWidth(double w) 
00206 {
00207    d_width = w;
00208    if (d_width < 0.03) 
00209         d_width = 0.03;
00210 
00211    if (d_width > 0.4) 
00212         d_width = 0.4;
00213 }
00214 
00215 void QwtSimpleCompassRose::setNumThorns(int numThorns) 
00216 {
00217     if ( numThorns < 4 )
00218         numThorns = 4;
00219 
00220     if ( numThorns % 4 )
00221         numThorns += 4 - numThorns % 4;
00222 
00223     d_numThorns = numThorns;
00224 }
00225 
00226 int QwtSimpleCompassRose::numThorns() const
00227 {
00228    return d_numThorns;
00229 }
00230 
00231 void QwtSimpleCompassRose::setNumThornLevels(int numThornLevels) 
00232 {
00233     d_numThornLevels = numThornLevels;
00234 }

00236 int QwtSimpleCompassRose::numThornLevels() const
00237 {
00238     return d_numThornLevels;
00239 }
